Articles.Content:
Hello fellow KSP players!

Have you ever tried a mission with an ion powered spacecraft and were like, "Uugh, this is taking forever" when doing anything with the ion engine?

Well, those days are gone! I now present to you:

Better ion drives!

Parts:

> 
> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/KDQw2)

If you don't want to put tons of RTGs or solar panels on your ship, try this mod which adds in a very simple nuclear reactor:

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/128486-Simple-Nuclear-Reactor?p=2074893#post2074893](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/128486-Simple-Nuclear-Reactor?p=2074893#post2074893)

More to come soon!

Planned:

2.5m Ion stuff

Radial Ion Engines

Download from *[snip]*

*[Download link removed by moderator. Former mod-hosting site is defunct and now hosts malware.]*

This mod is under the MIT License

**Edited <time datetime="2018-11-14T19:52:27Z" title="11/14/2018 07:52  PM" data-short="5 yr">November 14, 2018</time> by Snark**
  
Link to defunct malware-infested mod-hosting site removed by moderator

3 things.

1: The KerbalStuff link you've pasted in your OP has stupid\_user=True set, you might want to exclude that.

2: The "BetterIonEngine " folder in your .zip has whitespace tacked on the end that it shouldn't.

3: You need to list a license in your OP. See [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/87841](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/87841) for more info.
